about_the_game:
In Contingency Plan, you and up to 3 crewmates will use immersive VR interactions to pilot, repair, and upgrade a highly capable combat frigate to complete contracts and make money.
Use salvage and rewards during your journey to fund upgrades and purchases, skillfully pilot your ship to avoid enemy fire, use the physical-movement-based ship turret controls to shoot down enemies, and board enemy outposts with your crew to loot what you can find, solve puzzles, and take out any opposition!

This is a final project developed by a small team of students in a short time. You may encounter bugs or unfinished gameplay. Regardless, we do still plan to support this game post-launch.

Features:
  • 4 player online multiplayer
  • Immersive VR flight controls
  • Multiple levels, linked by a unique warping mechanic
  • Immersive environments filled with interactive elements
  • Hectic gameplay requiring teamwork
  • Physically controlled ship turrets
  • Dock to enemy outposts to complete missions, eliminate enemies, and gather loot
  • Ship upgrades
  • Multiple on-foot and flying enemy types

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5-6600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR, Oculus Touch/Valve Index Controllers or better (NOT compatible with HTC Vive Wand controllers)

short_description: Take control of a capable combat frigate with your friends in Contingency Plan, a VR multiplayer co-op sci-fi spaceflight game about taking contracts and making money.
